comments:
I copied an existing CDT project to a new directory, then tried to create a remote project. This caused the following NPE:

This bug is likely because the CDT DynamicVariable ResourceResolver is not aware of the fact that in a remote project, IResource.getLocation() can return null. The code must be migrated as described in section 1 of

http://help.eclipse.org/help33/topic/org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv/porting/3.2/incompatibilities.html
